subtitle: Chan Thomas describes in detail what
this will be like and it's worse than
any Hollywood disaster movie ever
conceived far worse
Chan Thomas begins his book with a
chapter that describes exactly what
we'll experience during this pole shift
event with the rumble so low is to be
inaudible in fuming into a thundering
Roar the earthquake starts only it's not
like any earthquake in history in
California mountains shake like ferns in
a breeze a mighty Pacific rears back and
piles up into a mountain of seawater
more than two miles high then starts its
race Eastward
the wind attacks shredding everything in
supersonic bombardment the mountain of
Pacific seawater follows the wind
Eastward burying Los Angeles and San
Francisco as if they were but grains of
sand
